data.title: CMS Blog Whitelabel
data.description: A pure Laravel project. Contains a demo blog site using Blade for front end rendering and an admin dashboard for managing users, posts, comments, media, and useage statistics. Created with Laravel 5.7 and Homestead.

data.title: Ravenous
data.description: A compendium of all things delicious, without all the 'backpacking through Spain' blog stories. *Under Current Development*

data.title: Currency Converter
data.description: A mobile app for converting currencies built with React Native and Fixer.io api. Bootstrapped with Expo.

data.title: AR Car Performance
data.description: Augmented Reality app, showcasing automobiles in real space, using Vuforia. Voice activated responsiveness utilizing WitAI to manipulate the cars features and change colors. This demo can be adapted to display any product for any company.

data.title: Meditations
data.description: An app about what is, not what might be. Receive wisdom from the greatest minds in human history in the form of random quotes. Access to several additional features to help you focus during meditation sessions. Coming Soon for Android devices.

data.title: GeoFrenzy
data.description: Geofencing for everyone. Work included sitewide redesign and rebuild of whitelabel portal using Vue.js. Start defining your own rules on your own spaces today. All you need is a geodomain to get started.

data.title: Stirfry Republic
data.description: Best stirfry in the valley! Designed and prototyped a mobile app using Vue.js, Capacitor.js, and Ionic4. Feature focused on a robust user rewards program

data.title: Street Eats
data.description: PunchCode Capstone project looking to connect hungry people with the local food truck business. Our very first React.js project

data.title: Street Eats - App
data.description: React Native app to allow Street Eats users to find trucks on the go.
